recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper. Simple yet delicious!

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.summary: A quick and healthy stir fry loaded with colorful vegetables and a savory sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.summary: Breaded chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese, served with pasta.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.summary: A nutritious salad with quinoa, fresh vegetables, and a light vinaigrette dressing.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.summary: Seasoned ground beef served in corn tortillas with fresh toppings and salsa.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.summary: Creamy Italian rice dish with mushrooms, white wine, and Parmesan cheese.
